items.sentence: Tom probably didn\'t even know about the meeting.
Tom said that he wasn\'t good at speaking French.
I wish I could do everything that I wanted to do.
I keep telling you I don\'t want to study French.
Tom finally got hold of the rare stamp he wanted.
Tom first met Mary when they were in high school.
Tom found an old coin just outside the back door.
Tom said he was really glad Mary moved to Boston.
Why don\'t you go out and play with your friends?
Why don\'t you just ask me what you want to know?
I haven\'t actually decided to build a house yet.
Tom dove into the water and tried to rescue Mary.
Tom got flustered when filling out the paperwork.
Tom had enough time to do what needed to be done.
Have I ever told you how I became a circus clown?
Have you been back to Boston since you graduated?
Tom and Mary excused themselves and went outside.
Tom and Mary have been best of friends for years.
Tom died a little after 2:30 yesterday afternoon.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t agree on which one to buy.
